TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_21
TestCase.Purpose: This test unit evaluates the possibility for the user to restrict the access rights requested by the eService (CHAT restriction) if no RequiredCHAT is present.

Command.Text: Follow the Online-Authentication as described in until the access rights are displayed. In deviation to EID_CLIENT_B_01 also use the element "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" in DIDAuthenticateEAC1InputType.

TestStep.Description: The element "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" contains a valid date for the age verification.
The element "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" contains a valid date for the document validity check.
The element "AuthenticatedAuxiliaryData" contains a valid municipality ID.

ExpectedResult.Text: The access rights contained in the CHAT of the eService certificate are displayed.
The eID-Client allows the user to deselect all access rights granted by the eService certificate.
